title: #396: I Just Killed My Dad - Part 2
description:
We continue our analysis of Anthony Templet, the 17 year old boy who shot and killed his father, Burt - some would say in cold blood, others would argue it was manslaughter. Turning to focus on Theresa, his mother, whom Anthony was stolen from when he was five years old, Laura and Jim discuss the massive problems in the family court system. Lisa asks about law enforcment's deliberations between self defense and second degree murder charge in this case. 

#hisnameisAnthonyTemplet #ijustkilledmydad #netflix #documentary

#childabuse #domesticabuse #deprivationisabuse #expertanalysis 


CRIME ANALYST PODCAST - 

You’re interested in real crime? Tick 

You’re interested in good storytelling? Tick

You want content that’s respectful to the victims and honours them Tick

And you want more insight and in-depth analysis about “the who” “the what” “the where” “the when” “the how” and “the why”? Tick

And you want to know how you can prevent it? Tick

Congratulations! You’ve found your next podcast!

Ride shotgun with me, Laura Richards world renowned and award-winning Criminal Behavioural Analyst, former New Scotland Yard every week as we profile behaviour and identify the red flags to prevent murders in slow motion.

Come join me in the intelligence cell as we deconstruct and analyse real cases.

www.crime-analyst.com

KILLER CASTING PODCAST - Next up we tackle the recent controversial casting news about James Franco playing the role of Fidel Castro in "Alina of Cuba". Why does authenticity in casting matter? Find out when you join Lisa, casting director Carla Hool and award winning actor/producer Elaine Del Valle. www.killercastingpod.com 

BEST CASE WORST CASE

Be sure and check out Jim’s podcast Best Case/Worst Case that he does along with former Federal Prosecutor Francey Hakes. Join them as they go behind police lines with unparalleled access to law enforcement officers, looking back at their most memorable cases – for better or for worse. Subscribe now!
